thread.title: Pirates head into offseason after another October stumble
thread.title_full: Pirates head into offseason after another October stumble

title: Pirates head into offseason after another October stumble
text:
> Sports Pirates head into offseason after another October stumble Pittsburgh Pirates manager Clint Hurdle chews bubble gum as he walks through the dugout as his team trails the Chicago Cubs during the seventh inning of the National League wild card baseball game, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Pittsburgh. The Cubs won 4-0, and move on to play the St. Louis Cardinals in the NL Division Series. (AP Photo/Gene J.Puskar) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
